about_the_game:
Inspired by known dodgeball mods found in other games.

Be faster than your opponent!


In this game, you compete with other players by reflecting a homing projectile (called Magiball). Failure to do so will result in your death! Cast your spell at the right time to reflect the Magiball to another player and win the round!

Sabotage your opponent!


Although attack spells are forbidden in the sport, you can sabotage your opponent! Block their view, jump at them or use your spell to push them and make them miss their timing!

Find communities to play with!


Magiball Wizards fully supports and recommend the use and creation of dedicated servers for players to form communities and new friendships.

Major Features:


  • Intense mouse clicking;
  • Online PVP Multiplayer;
  • Bots.
